p: Other studies show phenolic compounds in the Coccoloba genus. Cota [ 10] working with C. acrostichoides identified betulin and Î²-sitosterol using TLC. Ashmawy et al. [ 12] working with C. uvifera leaves detected ellagic acid, benzoic acid, o-coumaric acid, rutin, myricetin, and quercetin in water, acetone, and ethanol extracts. Furthermore, for C. mollis triterpenes, diterpenes, anthraquinones, phytosteroids, and benzenes were identified in leaves and shoots [ 11].
